name: Pressure Cooker Potato Salad
author: Peach822
summary: Reduce the time it takes to make this all-time favorite dish and keep the potatoes firm and fresh with this tasty potato salad recipe! I use only one egg yolk and all three whites from the three hard-cooked eggs, but adjust to your own taste.
directions: Place potatoes in pressure cooker with water
If potatoes are larger, cook for 4 minutes
Then quickly release pressure and open cooker
Peel and dice potatoes when they are cool enough to handle
Alternate layers of potatoes, onion, and celery in a large bowl
Season each layer with salt and pepper
Top with the chopped egg and sprinkle with dill
Mix together the mayonnaise, mustard, and cider vinegar in a small bowl
Gently fold the mayonnaise mixture into the potatoes
Chill at least one hour before serving
